attributes.action: remove the red tape for ukrainian refugees to relocate to the UK
attributes.additional_details: the 30 page form needed to be filled out at the moment is almost impossible for those who don't have all their documents, internet access, or who don't understand English well
attributes.background: make it much less complicated for ukrainian refugees to get a visa to obtain sanctuary in the UK

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530
